titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: ACTIVITY RESOURCE IDENTIFIER FOR PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING - Description

body.p: A unique identifier to report ACTIVITY PROPERTY components such as staffing, supplies, systems and facilities, used to deliver care activities to a PATIENT , for the purposes of reporting Patient_Level_Information_Costing . The unique identifier is generated through the costing process (mapping and local Patient_Level_Information_Costing system).
